ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.12.* *_cpython
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
NVD3 is an attempt to build re-usable charts and chart components
for d3.js without taking away the power that d3.js offers you.
Python-NVD3 makes your life easy! You write Python and the library
renders JavaScript for you!
about.summary: Python NVD3 - Chart Library for d3.js

about.description:
NVD3 is an attempt to build re-usable charts and chart components
for d3.js without taking away the power that d3.js offers you.
Python-NVD3 makes your life easy! You write Python and the library
renders JavaScript for you!
about.summary: Python NVD3 - Chart Library for d3.js

name: python-nvd3
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "python-nvd3" %}
{% set version = "0.16.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/python-nvd3-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0115887289b3f751716ddd05c7b53ac5f05e71201e52496decdac453a50dcf7e

build:
  entry_points:
    - nvd3 = nvd3.NVD3Chart:_main
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - python-slugify >=1.2.5
    - jinja2 >=2.8

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - nvd3
  commands:
    - nvd3 --help

about:
  home: http://github.com/areski/python-nvd3
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Python NVD3 - Chart Library for d3.js'

  description: |
    NVD3 is an attempt to build re-usable charts and chart components
    for d3.js without taking away the power that d3.js offers you.
    Python-NVD3 makes your life easy! You write Python and the library
    renders JavaScript for you!
  doc_url: http://python-nvd3.readthedocs.io/en/latest
  dev_url: http://github.com/areski/python-nvd3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
    - xylar
